TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_batad_nu_wali, title = batad_nu_wali, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/batad_nu_wali} }

S.FORM: batad nu wali (kamu nu Hulam: 遠東 ) u katinengan nu salengacay a tademaw i "tipay" . u batad nu wali hananay ku sawalian nu "nutipan nu Europe" . i tepal ku "untipan nu Europe" , u "tepalay a wali" hananay. izaw ku "nuwalian nu O-Cuo" (East Europe, 東歐), "nuwalitimulan nu Europe" , "nuamisan nu Africa " atu Turkey . u "inutebanan nu walian" hananay izaw ku "nuwalian nu Africa" , Li-Fan-Te (黎凡特, Lavent ), A-La-Po pangkiw a subal atu "inutebanan nu Asia" . "batad nu wali" saan sa, namaka kakitidaan atu kitakit nu European a tademaw , u lala' i batad nu wali mueneng ku takuliyaway a tademaw . sakawalian sabataday a China , Korea North , atu Japan , u "nuwalian nu Asia" hananay. sisa u batad nu wali saan sa. izaw ku henay Siberia , u "nuamisan nu Asia" hananay, atu "walitimulan nu Asia" .

batad no wali (kamo no Holam: 遠東 ) o katinengan no salengacay a tademaw i "tipay" . o batad no wali hananay ko sawalian no "notipan no Eorope" . i tepal ko "ontipan no Eorope" , o "tepalay a wali" hananay. izaw ko "nowalian no O-Coo" (East Eorope, 東歐), "nowalitimolan no Eorope" , "noamisan no Africa " ato Torkey . o "inotebanan no walian" hananay izaw ko "nowalian no Africa" , Li-Fan-Te (黎凡特, Lavent ), A-La-Po pangkiw a sobal ato "inotebanan no Asia" . "batad no wali" saan sa, namaka kakitidaan ato kitakit no Eoropean a tademaw , o lala' i batad no wali moeneng ko takoliyaway a tademaw . sakawalian sabataday a China , Korea North , ato Japan , o "nowalian no Asia" hananay. sisa o batad no wali saan sa. izaw ko henay Siberia , o "noamisan no Asia" hananay, ato "walitimolan no Asia" .
